name: Pinball Arena
description:
Pinball Arena is a game that shoots marbles to destroy bricks, using the cooperation between marbles to destroy falling bricks and defeat powerful bosses. Unlike the traditional brick-hitting game, in this game you need not only aiming, but also deck building, which you can think of as a card meat pigeon game, except that the cards become marbles. You can build small decks that strengthen one marbles as the main output, or you can build large decks that enhance the strength of all marbles, depending on your choice in one game.
Game features
70+ different kinds of marbles
50+ engravings and power-ups to strengthen the marbles and themselves
6 difficulty levels to satisfy players of different proficiency levels
Low difficulty of operation, only two operations, typing and discarding, many genres only need to press and hold the left mouse button to type the whole process after formation
3 bosses with their own characteristics
The initial order of marbles controlled by the player does not depend on the dealer's face
